structure.unit: Massachusetts Low Level Radioactive Waste Management Act

law.catch_line: Phase Vi Of The Low Level Radioactive Waste Management Act; Institutional Control Of Facility
law.text: Institutional control of a facility shall be conducted, subject to appropriation, in accordance with sections forty-six and forty-seven, which shall be known and may be cited as “Phase VI of the Low-Level Radioactive Waste Management Act”, and in accordance with the regulations adopted pursuant to section sixteen. The provisions of these sections and regulations shall be implemented so as to provide for the safe and orderly institutional control of a facility following transfer of the facility license from the operator to the board.
